data.title: Company Profile
data.meta_description: Dell - Manufacturer of enterprise servers. Public Company. Raised funding over 5 rounds from 12 investors. Founded by Michael Dell in the year 1984. Dell has 523 competitors.

Dell - About the company

What does Dell do?

Manufacturer of enterprise servers. It is a manufacturer and provider of consumer electronics and enterprise cloud solutions. It offers products and services including personal computers, servers, networking products, storage systems, mobility products, software and peripherals, and services. It provides hybrid cloud computing solutions. It also provides cloud computing solutions such as cloud management, disaster recovery solutions, and more.

Which sectors and market segments does Dell operate in?

Dell serves in the B2B, SaaS space .

Who are Dell's investors?

Dell has 11 institutional investor s including Credit Suisse, Bank of America and RBC Capital Markets. Carl Icahn is only Angel Investor in Dell .

View details of Dell funding rounds and investors

Dell's founders and board of directors

Founder? Claim Profile

Who are the founders of Dell?

The founders of Dell is Michael Dell. Michael Dell has founded 5 more compan ies - Michael & Susan Dell Foundation, Dell, BDT & MSD Partners, MSD Capital and DFO.

Who is the current CEO of Dell?

Michael Dell is the CEO of Dell .

Dell's Competitors and alternates

Competitive landscape of Dell

Dell ranks 8 th among 523 competitors which include Hewlett Packard Enterprise, NetApp and Broadcom. 37 of its competitors are funded while 122 have exited. Overall, Dell and its competitors have raised over $7.23B in funding across 301 funding rounds involving 571 investors. There are 3 private unicorns, 34 public and 88 acquired companies in the entire competition set.

Frequently asked questions about Dell

When was Dell founded?

Dell was founded in 1984

Where is Dell located?

Dell is located in Round Rock, United States.

Is Dell a public company?

Dell is a public company, it went public on Dec 21, 2018.

When was the latest funding round of Dell?

Dell's latest funding round was on Apr 03, 2020

What is the annual revenue of Dell?

Annual revenue of Dell is $371M as on Dec 31, 2023
